text: Good little neighborhood pizza place. Looks like most of the orders are for take out or delivery. There are a few small tasks for dine in. Pizza is freshly made so can take a few extra minutes. Crust is medium, not truly thin crust. Good selection of varieties. Open till pretty late at night for those late dinners too.

For those who like their pizza crust to be thin and crispy, this is definitely the place to go to. We ordered their Margherita and ham & cheese pizza. The order was done via foodpanda and it arrived fast. Both pizzas were still warm when received. Perfect for those who would like a snack for tea time. For the price paid, it was definitely a steal!

Thank you for such a delicious Pizza!! We were slightly scared what if it does not taste good, but were pleasantly surprised with simply cheese and veggie delight pizza! Family loved it!! Awesome Chef! ❤️ ordered online

Ordered the ham and cheese pizza through FoodPanda (price was as per their website), taste-wise was good, just the food temperature was a bit cold although the delivery was quicker. But I’ll try to get the food in store next time to see if the temperature is right.
Why does mine look so different from the rest? Is it from a new cook? It's dry.
